data.title: Business Development Advisor
data.meta_description: Mike will partner Central Florida Attorneys with The Fundâ€™s team of experts to ensure successful real estate transactions.
data.text:
Mike has been on The Fund's Member Account Executive team since 2013. At first, he worked exclusively with our Members across the State who concentrate on foreclosures and REO transactions. Over the last few years, he expanded his coverage to include many residential and commercial real estate law firms and title agencies throughout Hillsborough, Sarasota and Manatee Counties.

Prior to 2013, Mike worked as a real estate attorney and was a Fund Member. He founded and operated a title agency in Tampa, where he and his staff handled over one thousand closings, utilizing many of the tools provided by The Fund, such as DoubleTime and ATIDS. During this part of his career, he also relied heavily on The Fund's Underwriting, Education and other Member support departments.

Mike grew up in and continues to reside in Tampa. He obtained his B.S. in Accounting and his J.D. from the University of Florida.

As a former Member, Mike brings a unique perspective to his role at The Fund. He sees things from the Member's side. As such, he actively looks for solutions to the issues and challenges they face, and he is eager to make their experience with The Fund the best one possible.

Request a Meeting

Find out how Mike Wallace and The Fund team can help support your real estate transactions and provide market insight to Tampa.
